title: Green Olive Salad
source: The Food of Sicily - Fabrizia Lanza
categories: The Food of Sicily - Fabrizia Lanza
ingredients: 1celery stalk with some tender leaves, chopped
directions: 1. Place the olives in a colander and rinse under running water to remove excess salt. Shake dry.2. Transfer the olives to a medium bowl and add the onion, carrot, celery, and oregano.3. Stir in the olive oil and vinegar.4. Serve at room temperature.
